title: Sleeve Fragments, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, metal
Technique: embroidered
description: Sleeves of heavy cotton embroidered in repeat pattern of highly stylized medallions, plant and geometric forms. Worked with silver thread, pink, lavender and citron wool, and red, purple and green cotton. Pailettes are attached to the crocheted edges of the sleeves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sleeve Fragments, 19th century. Medium: cotton, wool, metal
Technique: embroidered. 
1969-86-15-a,b
